getTransformedPixel

public final KinectPoint3D getTransformedPixel(float pixel_location_x,
                                               float pixel_location_y,
                                               float depth_in_cm)
transforms a pixel, depending on its depth-value (in centimeters), into the camera-space.

Parameters:
pixel_location_x - x position of a pixel
pixel_location_y - y position of a pixel
depth_in_cm - distance from camera origin
Returns:
a KinectPoint3D
